column1: * 1856 - The wedding of John Benjamin Tolkien and Mary Jane Stow
* 1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Fay Darrington (16 February 1972).
* 1974 - On the advice of Christopher Tolkien
column2: The Tolkien Society appoints J.R.R. Tolkien as Honorary President in perpetuo.

column1: * 1991 – The second day of the first "Colloquium on the Languages of Middle-earth" at the house of Elvish Linguistic Fellowship member Bill Welden.
* 1995 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 4 is published.
** Farewell to Lothlórien. Galadriel gives the Fellowship of the Ring gifts on their departure.
** They travel south over the Anduin by boat while Gollum in hiding observes and follows them.
